omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		l1.NHSNumber as nhs_number,
		drugs.Code as DrugSourceValue,
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeStartDate, l5.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureStartDate,  
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeEndDate, l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureEndDate,
		case 
			when l5.EpisodeEndDate is null and l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell is null then 32220
			else 32818
		end as DrugTypeConceptId
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_high_cost_drugs] drugs
		on l1.MessageId = drugs.MessageId
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line04] l4 
		on l4.MessageId = l1.MessageId
	left join [omop_staging].[cds_line05] l5 
		on l5.MessageId = l1.MessageId

omopColumns.name: drug_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Converts ICD10/OPCS4 concepts to SNOMED concepts.

omopColumns.name: drug_exposure_start_date

dataSource.name: ExposureStartDate
dataSource.description: Start date of the episode, if exists, else the start date of the spell, if exists, else the message date.

omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		l1.NHSNumber as nhs_number,
		drugs.Code as DrugSourceValue,
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeStartDate, l5.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureStartDate,  
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeEndDate, l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureEndDate,
		case 
			when l5.EpisodeEndDate is null and l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell is null then 32220
			else 32818
		end as DrugTypeConceptId
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_high_cost_drugs] drugs
		on l1.MessageId = drugs.MessageId
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line04] l4 
		on l4.MessageId = l1.MessageId
	left join [omop_staging].[cds_line05] l5 
		on l5.MessageId = l1.MessageId

omopColumns.name: drug_exposure_end_date

dataSource.name: ExposureEndDate
dataSource.description: End date of the episode, if exists, else the spell discharge date, if exists, else the message date.

omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		l1.NHSNumber as nhs_number,
		drugs.Code as DrugSourceValue,
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeStartDate, l5.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureStartDate,  
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeEndDate, l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureEndDate,
		case 
			when l5.EpisodeEndDate is null and l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell is null then 32220
			else 32818
		end as DrugTypeConceptId
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_high_cost_drugs] drugs
		on l1.MessageId = drugs.MessageId
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line04] l4 
		on l4.MessageId = l1.MessageId
	left join [omop_staging].[cds_line05] l5 
		on l5.MessageId = l1.MessageId

omopColumns.name: drug_type_concept_id

dataSource.name: DrugTypeConceptId
dataSource.description: If the patient was discharged `32818` otherwise `32220`.

omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		l1.NHSNumber as nhs_number,
		drugs.Code as DrugSourceValue,
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeStartDate, l5.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureStartDate,  
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeEndDate, l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureEndDate,
		case 
			when l5.EpisodeEndDate is null and l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell is null then 32220
			else 32818
		end as DrugTypeConceptId
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_high_cost_drugs] drugs
		on l1.MessageId = drugs.MessageId
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line04] l4 
		on l4.MessageId = l1.MessageId
	left join [omop_staging].[cds_line05] l5 
		on l5.MessageId = l1.MessageId

omopColumns.name: drug_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve OPCS4 codes to OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		l1.NHSNumber as nhs_number,
		drugs.Code as DrugSourceValue,
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeStartDate, l5.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureStartDate,  
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeEndDate, l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureEndDate,
		case 
			when l5.EpisodeEndDate is null and l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell is null then 32220
			else 32818
		end as DrugTypeConceptId
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_high_cost_drugs] drugs
		on l1.MessageId = drugs.MessageId
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line04] l4 
		on l4.MessageId = l1.MessageId
	left join [omop_staging].[cds_line05] l5 
		on l5.MessageId = l1.MessageId

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		l1.NHSNumber as nhs_number,
		drugs.Code as DrugSourceValue,
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeStartDate, l5.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureStartDate,  
		coalesce(l5.EpisodeEndDate, l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureEndDate,
		case 
			when l5.EpisodeEndDate is null and l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell is null then 32220
			else 32818
		end as DrugTypeConceptId
from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_high_cost_drugs] drugs
		on l1.MessageId = drugs.MessageId
	inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line04] l4 
		on l4.MessageId = l1.MessageId
	left join [omop_staging].[cds_line05] l5 
		on l5.MessageId = l1.MessageId
